original_text: But now you have a lot of trouble, because God is punishing you as wicked people deserve. God is right and fair to judge you like that. But now you have a lot of trouble,
korean_text: 이제는 악인의 받을 벌이 그대에게 가득하였고 심판과 정의가 그대를 잡았나니

sentences.original_text: But now you have a lot of trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 지금 당신은 많은 고통을 겪고 있습니다
